definitions.title: vb.Pi.denom
definitions.body: (from [[עֵקַר]] or other like word = (root-sinew), hamstring;—hamstring horses (on Arab. funeral usage, with camel and horse v. We:Heid. 2, 181): Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ע]] Jos 11:9, Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיְעַקֵּר]] 2Sa 8:4 = 1Ch 18:4, 2 ms. [[תְּעַקֵּר]] Jos 11:6 all c. acc.; Pf. 3 mpl. [[עִקְּרוּ שׁוֹר]] Ge 49:6they hamstrung an ox.
